data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will affect the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day over the region. An intense replenishment of the northeast monsoon is expected to reach Guangdong next Monday night. Under the influence of the monsoon and a broad band of clouds, it will be windy, very dry and becoming appreciably cool over the coastal areas in the following couple of days, and cold over inland areas. With the monsoon moderating slightly, daytime temperatures over the coast of southern China will rise gradually in the latter part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251115","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches at first.
